title: Musical Tales
creator_credit: BBC-TV, John Hosier and Elizabeth Bennett
brief_description: This beautifully animated puppet film presents four of your favourite stories set to the great classical music of Tschaikovsky, Stravinsky and Delibes. Featurees “The Nutcracker and the Mouse King”, “Petrushka”, “Coppelia” and “Sleeping Beauty”.
